info.title: ODIN Fleet API
info.description: API to access Odin Fleet, empowering developers to deploy gameservers all around the world in just a few lines of code.

get.summary: Show a specific app location setting
Show all location settings
Show all apps
Show a specific app

delete.description:
This method is responsible for deleting an App record from the database.
It locates the App instance using the provided ID, and if found, proceeds to delete it.
Upon successful deletion, an HTTP 204 No Content response is returned, indicating
that the action was successful.

post.description:
Validates the incoming request and attempts to authenticate the user based on the provided session ID.
If the user is authenticated successfully, it returns an AuthResource containing the user's bearer token.

delete.summary: Handles the deletion of a user's authentication tokens

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The session id of the user

parameters.description: Instance of the app to filter services by.

post.summary: Creates a backup of the service

get.summary: Display the most recent backup for the specified Docker service

post.summary: Restore a backup for a specified Docker service

get.summary: List all backups for the specified Docker service
Generates a presigned URL for downloading a backup from AWS S3 if the backup method is 'archive'

get.description:
Synchronizes the local database with the state of Docker nodes,
then filters for active, ready worker nodes to create a unique listing of their
location labels. These nodes are suitable for deployment.
get.summary: Show a unique listing of locations based on active and ready worker nodes
Show all server configs
Show a specific server config
Get launchers for a specific steamworks app ID, optionally filtered by OS

parameters.name: os
parameters.description: The operating system of the binary
